    • play中Http.Response的使用

      参数类型为Http.Response的play中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean PlayPlugin.rawInvocation(Http.Request request, Http.Response response)
      Give a chance to this plugin to fully manage this request
      boolean CorePlugin.rawInvocation(Http.Request request, Http.Response response)
      Intercept /@status and check that the Authorization header is valid.
      boolean PlayPlugin.serveStatic(VirtualFile file, Http.Request request, Http.Response response)
      Let a chance to this plugin to manage a static resource

      参数类型为Http.Response的play.test中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void FunctionalTest.assertCharset(String charset, Http.Response response)
      Verify response charset encoding, as returned by the server in the Content-Type header.
      static void FunctionalTest.assertContentEquals(String content, Http.Response response)
      Exact equality assertion on response body
      static void FunctionalTest.assertContentMatch(String pattern, Http.Response response)
      Asserts response body matched a pattern or contains some text.
      static void FunctionalTest.assertContentType(String contentType, Http.Response response)
      Verify the response content-type
      static void FunctionalTest.assertHeaderEquals(String headerName, String value, Http.Response response)
      Exact equality assertion on a response header value

      Asserts a 404 (not found) response
      static void FunctionalTest.assertIsOk(Http.Response response)
      Asserts a 2OO Success response

      Asserts response status code
      static String FunctionalTest.getContent(Http.Response response)
